snippet.title: Foxhole - The Bridge!
snippet.description:
Mike takes a look at the experimental prototype for Foxhole, a massively multiplayer game where you work with hundreds of players to shape the outcome of a single persistent online war. One man can make a difference, but a good team can win a war, and even in this early combat focused prototype, it's clear to see the potential of Foxhole - a game where collaborative strategy and tactics are king.

Check it out on Steam Greenlight here: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=723054337

And grab yourself a copy of the experimental alpha here:
https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://s3.amazonaws.com/clapfootpublic/FoxholePrototype_10838.exe

www.thingsweplay.com
Follow us on twitter: @thingsweplay
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/thingsweplay

Follow Mike on twitter: @videosaur
